Skills Required : C/C++ Programming Language Description : 
 Level 1: (Time : 10 minutes)
 ‌First 5 Minutes: THE SCREEN WOULD BE TURNED ON . Problem is Given to the participants and The participants have to type the solution code .
‌
Last 5 Minute:THE MONITOR IS TURNED OFF 
The Participants can Continue solving the problem . The Candidates that fulfill the level 1 passing criteria (say at most 3 errors and 1 warning) will move to LEVEL 2 ________________________________________ 
Level 2 : (Time : 7 minutes) 
New Coding problem is Given to the qualifying participants . ‌THE SCREENS REMAINS OFF FOR 5 MINUTE and The participants code the solution THE SCREEN IS TURNED ON FOR 30 SECONDS AND TURNED OFF ‌Again the participants given 2 minute more to complete the solution code. The Candidates that fulfill the level 2 passing criteria (say at most 1 errors and 1 warning) will move to LEVEL 3 ________________________________________ 
Level 3 : The Final Round (Time : 5 Minutes) 
Note: NO USE OF BACKSPACE and MONITOR REMAINS OFF FOR ENTIRE 5 MINUTES ‌Coding problem is Given to the qualifying participants and allowed to code solution. After 5 Minutes their code is compiled and the 3 candidate with no errors or least no of error and warning will be winners . ___________________END_________________
